title: Himi 564
lyrics:
M.Kh.
(“’Ai ‘eku ‘ioke kiate kimoutolu,
pea mou ako ‘iate au.” Matiu 11:29)
1.
Sīsū ne ui ‘i mu’a ‘a e kakai:
Ha’u kia au, haʻu kia au.
Ko e lelei ‘oku kumi ki ai
‘E ‘ikai maʻu ‘i māmani.
Kau mafasia, mou haʻu kia au;
‘Ai ‘eku ‘ioke, ‘o ako kotoa ‘ia au.
2.
Loto hoha’a ‘oku kumi ha nonga,
Haʻu kia au, haʻu kia au.
Hala ‘a e meʻa ‘a māmani kotoa;
Lepa pē ia kuo foa.
Kau mafasia, etc.
3.
Si’i to’e loto he fua ho’mou hia
Ha’u, kia au, ha’u kia au.
Ha’u, pea u ‘atu ha fu’u fiefia,
‘Ikai ha kei mafasia.
Kau mafasia, etc.
4.
Kau ongosia he tau mo e kovi,
Ha’u kia au, ha’u kia au,
Ho’mou vevela na kuo u ongo’i,
He ne u mo’ua ai foki.
Kau mafasia, etc.
5.
Naʻa ku totongi ho’mou angahala,
Haʻu kia au, haʻu kia au.
Kuo u ha’u eni ke faka’atā,
Huʻi kotoa homou mala.
Kau mafasia, etc.
6.
Kau mafasia, mou haʻu kia au:
Haʻu kia au, haʻu kia au.
Tali ‘a e ‘ioke molū ni aʻaku,
Ko e mālōlō ‘e maʻu.
Kau mafasia, mou haʻu kia au:
‘Ai ‘eku ‘ioke, ‘o ako kotoa ‘ia au. *
